metadata.publisher: A Toulouse : De l'imprimerie de Noble J.-A.-H.-M. B. Pijon,
metadata.description: Variant of Bibliothèque nationale (France). Catalogue de l'histoire de la Révolution française, tome 4:2, entry 2004
Discours du roi -- Déclaration du roi, concernant la présente tenue des États-généraux, du 23 juin 1789 -- Discours du roi -- Déclaration des intentions du roi -- Discours du roi

No. 21 of 51 French pamphlets formerly owned by Peter G.S. Mero. Accompanied by extensive notes entitled "Pamphlets about the French Revolution" by J.G. Mero, dated July 1960-February 1961. Each pamphlet is also accompanied by explanatory notes or partial translation into English by J.G. Mero, who assembled the collection of pamphlets and gave it with the notes to Peter G.S. Mero
metadata.notes: No title page found. No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found.
